channel.title: George Martin on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in George Martin on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Am I the Walrus?
item.description: Today in Tedium: As well-loved as his productions were, iconic producer George Martin (not to be mistaken for this guy) didn’t bask in the glow of attention. For the most part, the iconic producer and arranger, who died this week at the age of 90, embraced his status as the man behind the boards, helping the Beatles create some of their greatest work. But considering how well-known the Beatles are, the band and its history—and, as a result, Martin’s well-tuned ear—go in a lot of weird directions.
